opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Walter R. Hearne v. Robert E. Smylie, Governor of Idaho

opinion:
379 U.S. 692

85 S.Ct. 713

13 L.Ed.2d 698

Walter R. HEARNE et al.
v.
Robert E. SMYLIE, Governor of Idaho, et al.

No. 617.

Supreme Court of the United States

February 1, 1965

Herman J. McDevitt, for appellants.

Allan G. Shepard, Atty. Gen. of Idaho and M. Allyn Dingel, Jr., Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellees Williams and others.

PER CURIAM.

1

This cause is continued on the docket until the Court Conference of May 21, 1965, before which time the parties are asked to advise the Court by supplemental briefs as to the progress made in reapportioning the Idaho Legislature.
